title: Public Service Ledger — Capability Map & MeritRails
summary: Open capability registry for agencies: roles, skills, vacancies, and vetted contributors (civil/contract) with provenance trails and conflict‑of‑interest checks.
rationale: Transparent, skills‑based staffing reduces patronage, accelerates rehiring, and lets diaspora experts plug in without gatekeeping.
impact: Faster reconstitution of critical teams; measurable reduction in staffing gaps; durable talent pipelines beyond election cycles.
